data.title: Beach Road Hotel
data.meta_description: Nestled in Bondi, The Beach Road Hotel, affectionately referred to as ‘The Beachy’, is a cornerstone of local culture attracting sports enthusiasts, party-goers, and locals alike. This iconic Australian venue flaunts a generous two-story layout, featuring four island bars, a dog-friendly beer garden, and an inviting upstairs courtyard.

Dust the sand off and enjoy your other home

Dust the sand off and enjoy your other home

Book a roomBook a table

Our Story

WELCOME TO THE BEACHY

Nestled in Bondi, The Beach Road Hotel, affectionately referred to as ‘The Beachy’, is a cornerstone of local culture attracting sports enthusiasts, party-goers, and locals alike. This iconic Australian venue flaunts a generous two-story layout, featuring four island bars, a dog-friendly beer garden, and an inviting upstairs courtyard. Further enhancing the space is the addition of Barrys Hotel on the top floor, offering private roof deck access to guests. With an epic dance floor for those looking to groove, ‘The Beachy’ caters to all facets of the Bondi lifestyle.

UPCOMING

WHAT’S ON

The Beachy has been a Bondi Institution for over 30 years. It boasts a 650 person Dancefloor upstairs across two epic rooms & top-tier production across both. The Beachy is your go-to for a thumping party with options from Wednesday to Saturday every week.

Downstairs we specialise in all the big screen sports action, we have daily food & Happy Hour drinks specials & host Bondi’s biggest Trivia on Tuesdays. To top it all off, we have a beautiful Beer Garden offering an ideal space to hang with friends & family and soak up the Summer Sun.

The best place to be watching UFC on a Sunday in Bondi. Multiple screens showing the action, venue wide. Coverage from 12pm, live & loud.

Join us for Bondi's best brain-teasing Trivia Tuesdays, starting at 7:00PM. Pair it with Taco Tuesday & enjoy some mid-week pub time.

Shake off the working week & let the hair down on our upstairs dance floor with Bands & DJs every week. A little something for everyone.

FOOD & DRINK

ROAD HOUSE KITCHEN

We all know the old saying that beer tastes better after a surf but word around town is that the best way to complete a sandy day is with a good ol’ feast at the Beachy. Check out our new menu and try some of the tasty morsels on offer… They’ll be sure to delight your senses and satiate the taste buds.

Daily Food Specials

TELL IT LIKE IT IS

WHAT PEOPLE ARE SAYING

“We had awesome service”

"Being ANZAC day, it was a really busy day for hospitality, yet we had awesome service from Heidi.... "

Lizzy Liersch

“Would live there if I could...”

""Huge venue, kind staff, great range of drinks and food. Would live there if I could… oh wait you can!"

Hugo Ilencik

“Excellent Vibe”

"Great place! Wide range of beer options, excellent vibe!"

Lucia Lopez

"Great for a beer..."

"Great for a beer, burger and pool!"

Natalia Monje

BOTTLE SHOP

THE BEACH ROAD DRIVE THROUGH

Explore an impressive variety of both local and international offerings, curated with an unwavering commitment to quality. We pride ourselves on our extensive selection of domestic and foreign beers, as well as an array of wines sourced from the globe’s finest vineyards. When in Bondi Beach, don’t miss the chance to visit us. Our expert staff is ready to guide you through our collection, offering personalized recommendations based on your preferences. For your convenience, we stay open late. Feel free to contact us at (02) 9130 7247.

Beach Road Hotel

Stay in the loop with our thrilling newsletter! Never miss out on big-screen sports, daily specials, free pool Mondays, Trivia Tuesdays, Thursday Parties, Live Music Fridays, and electrifying DJ sets on Saturdays. Subscribe now!
